label.value: ${eval( (${CL([type])}) ${get([title])} ${if(${id.purpose}<>iDoc).then(${id.uid})} ${get([emf:version])} ${get([emf:revisionNumber])} ${if(${id.purpose}<>iDoc).then(${get([description])})} ${user(${get([modifiedBy])})} ${date([modifiedOn]).format(dd.MM.yyyy, HH:mm)} )}
